channel.title: windows 10 on Main Page
channel.description: Recent content in windows 10 on Main Page

item.title: How to Install Linux Bash Shell on Windows 10
item.description: Step 1: Enable Windows subsytem for Linux Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux Open PowerShell as administrator run the above script Use Y or press enter when prompted to confirm reboot Step 2: Download a Linux system from Windows store Search for Linux in Windows 10 Store Downlaod and Install the distribution you want from Windows Store (I picked Ubuntu) Step 3: Launch Unbuntu (from you start menu) after initialising, it will ask for unix username and password enjoy your Linux subsystem
